snippet: Analysts think Amazon.com could be ready to move beyond its cloud services businesses -- renting data storage and raw computing power -- and add analysis software that can be rented, and possibly modified, to suit a company's needs. It would not be...
abstract: Analysts think Amazon.com could be ready to move beyond its cloud services businesses -- renting data storage and raw computing power -- and add analysis software that can be rented, and possibly modified, to suit a company's needs. It would not be difficult for Amazon to offer such a service since many of its major products are already on Amazon Web Services.

headline.main: Will Amazon Offer Analytics as a Service?
headline.print_headline: Amazon Expected To Start Offering Data Analytics
